subject: Baseball
Interscholastic Athletics
lead_paragraph: If all goes as projected, Mike Moustakas and Matt Dominguez will both be drafted in the first round Thursday, making Chatsworth High School the official capital of prep baseball.
snippet: If all goes as projected, Mike Moustakas and Matt Dominguez will both be drafted in the first round Thursday, making Chatsworth High School the official capital of prep baseball.
